stories.text:
Currently the frontend is open source but we're also considering open sourcing the backend. We have some pros and cons in mind but I'm not going to list them here to effect your thought process.

A little bit more context: Stormkit.io is a Vercel/Netlify alternative which allows users to host their application on different platforms like AWS S3 or BunnyCDN. We're a bootstrapped startup with 2 founders working part time on this.

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts!
stories.title: Ask HN: Shall we make Stormkit an open source Vercel alternative?
Effect of batch size on training dynamics

stories.text:
We received this message from Apple appstore a few days ago. ================= Weâ€™re reaching out because either your bank, an intermediary bank, or our banking partner will no longer process payments to the bank account you provided for vendor number XXXXXX. If you need to update your banking details, visit Agreements, Tax, and Banking in App Store Connect. ============ Apple explicitly refuses to give any info on the reasons of blocking. Needless to say, the bank account is in good standing and was used for like 8 years to get the payouts.

I know firsthand that Valve stopped (supposedly, temporarily) payments to Ukraine as well.

Did anyone other here (especially Ukrainian devs) received any similar message lately? Managed to resolve the issue?
stories.title: Ask HN: Apple Appstore blocks payouts to Ukraine?
